prTitle: feat: implement header and footer layout styles with responsive design
prBody:
## Summary

Implements header and footer layout styles for the donkey website with sticky positioning, flexbox layout, and mobile-first responsive design.

### ‚úÖ Acceptance Criteria Met

- **header.css** implements sticky positioning with proper z-index (1000) and shadow
- Header uses flexbox for logo and navigation alignment
- **footer.css** provides structured footer layout with proper spacing
- Both header and footer are responsive from mobile to desktop (breakpoints at 640px, 768px, 1024px)
- Styles reference custom properties for colors, spacing, and shadows with fallback values

### üèóÔ∏è Implementation Features

**Header (`src/styles/layout/header.css`):**
- Sticky positioning with proper z-index and subtle shadow
- Flexbox layout for logo and navigation alignment
- Mobile-first responsive approach
- Touch-friendly mobile menu toggle button (44px target size)
- Logo with hover and focus states
- Accessibility features (focus outlines, reduced motion support)

**Footer (`src/styles/layout/footer.css`):**
- Structured layout with proper content organization
- Responsive flexbox design (vertical on mobile, horizontal on desktop)
- Footer navigation, description, and copyright sections
- Proper spacing using design system tokens
- Accessibility considerations throughout

### üé® Design System Integration

- Uses CSS custom properties with fallback values
- Consistent spacing system (`--spacing-xs` through `--spacing-xl`)
- Color scheme using brown/earth tones (`--color-primary`, `--color-text`, etc.)
- Typography system with proper font stacks
- Mobile-first responsive breakpoints (640px, 768px, 1024px)

### ‚ôø Accessibility Features

- Proper focus states with visible outlines
- Respects `prefers-reduced-motion` for animations
- High contrast mode support
- Touch-friendly target sizes (minimum 44px)
- Semantic HTML structure support

Closes #12
